Class PlanningLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlanningLayer

  • public class PlanningLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Planning layer takes care of delibrative actions of the system. It derives legal/right plans that can be executed. If there are no plans that could be executed, it passes back to the reactive layer by returning null action to the control system. The Planning Layer has the backward planning ability that derive an optimal plan. A plan consist of set of Actions to be executed to reach a goal state. Each timestep the planner feeds an action from the action_list(the plan that stores actions in order) to the control system. If no actions are in the action_list, then the reactive layer will take over. However, control system still maintains the final decision to choose actions from reactive layers or planning layer based on the control rules.
    Author:
    dolphin

      • getTargetCoord

        public posXY getTargetCoord()

      • backwardsChaining

        private boolean backwardsChaining(Goal2 goal,
                                  java.lang.Object X)
        One of the most important part of the Deliberative Layer. Backwards Chaining fixes a certain goal to an object, and attempt to look for actions= in schemas that satisfies the goal. If preconditions are needed to be satisfied first before the action can be executed, the precondtions will be recursively backward chained to generate an action. Backwards chaining only returns true if the goal is satisfied. This allows control over what action to be made in regards to the goal satisfiabiity
        Parameters:
        goal - The goal to be achieved
        X - The item to be asserted with thhe goal
        Returns:
        returns true if the goal is satisfied with the current state

      • GeneratePlan

        private Plan GeneratePlan(java.util.ArrayList<dTask> tasks,
                          int curr_fuellevel,
                          int curr_pumpdist,
                          int curr_waterlevel)
        Generate Plan generates a plan by creating a new Plan object by the given paramters. A wrapper to the Plan class
        Parameters:
        tasks - tasks received from the Model Layer
        curr_fuellevel - current fuel level
        curr_pumpdist - current distance to pump
        curr_waterlevel - current water level
        Returns:

      • gatherPercepts2

        private void gatherPercepts2()
        Gather percepts first gathers all necessary information from the Model (fileterd by ControlSystem) that are needed to produce a plan. If a current plan is being pursued, the plan will be compared with the newly generated plan based on the Score Difference. If the score difference is more than 50% than the new plan will be used

      • executePlan

        private boolean executePlan(Plan plan)
        Executing a plan relates to backchaining each goal in the plan. If the goal is achieved, the goal will be removed from the plan
        Parameters:
        plan -
        Returns:
        true when the plan is done

      • getOutput

        public uk.ac.nott.cs.g54dia.library.Action getOutput()
        Final destination of the Deliberative Layer.
        Returns:
        the Action that the deliberative layer decided to execute. The action will then be filtered by the Control System.
